token = auth.Token(token='token') #auth.Sign(app_id='app_id', app_secret='app_secret')

client = YZClient(token)

params={}

params['mobile']="18810900503"
params['customer_create']="{"birthday":"1988-02-29","gender":1,"name":"李沛伦","remark":"没有啥","contact_address":{"address":"新风南里","area_code":518001}}"

files=[]

print client.invoke('youzan.scrm.customer.create', '3.0.0', 'POST', params=params, files=files)
